product.longDescription: Cupped, heavy leaves with lightly scalloped margins provide high loft for bagged mixes. Petioles stay narrow for a long harvest window. Upright growth habit. Maintains quality in the field. High resistance to downy mildew races EU 16–20, 22–25, 27, 28, 30, 32; US 5, 7, 9. MT0-30. USDA Certified Organic. Avg. 567,500 seeds/lb. Packet: 500 seeds.
product.shortDescription: Exclusive! Crunchy, juicy, sweet romaine for baby leaf.
